name: Tabata Protocol
description: A structured HIIT routine alternating 20 seconds of intense effort with 10 seconds of rest.

cards.title: Tabata Burpees for Total-Body Conditioning
cards.description: Performing burpees in an intense 20/10 format for cardiovascular and muscular endurance.
bulletpoints: Explode off the ground with full-body engagement
Maintain a steady pace throughout all rounds
Modify by removing the jump or push-up if needed
cards.summaryText: Attack burpees in 20/10 bursts, keeping form tight even as lungs burn.

cards.title: Tabata Squat Jumps for Lower Body Power
cards.description: Engaging fast-twitch muscle fibers for explosive leg strength.
bulletpoints: Land softly to protect the knees
Use arm swings to generate momentum
cards.summaryText: Punch out squat jumps hard for 20 seconds, reset quickly, and repeat.
